response.overview: While reading Rosa Luxemburg's book Mass Strike, Party and Trade Unions, I discovered that it was not my father's - as I had assumed- but my aunt's, so she and I started sending letters to each other. Writing to her becomes an exercise of memory in which affections and memories interconnect with the territories and political history of the place where I grew up (Lima-PE).
response.title: Love, labor, time… Strike!
